statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: For a decimal number x with n digits (A<sub>n</sub>A<sub>n-1</sub>A<sub>n-2</sub> ... A<sub>2</sub>A<sub>1</sub>), we define its weight as F(x) = A<sub>n</sub> * 2<sup>n-1</sup> + A<sub>n-1</sub> * 2<sup>n-2</sup> + ... + A<sub>2</sub> * 2 + A<sub>1</sub> * 1. Now you are given two numbers A and B, please calculate how many numbers are there between 0 and B, inclusive, whose weight is no more than F(A).

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line has a number T (T <= 10000) , indicating the number of test cases.
For each test case, there are two numbers A and B (0 <= A,B < 109)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For every case,you should output "Case #t: " at first, without quotes. The t is the case number starting from 1. Then output the answer.
